channel.title: Connect...wtf?
channel.description: The problem is that anyone can log into my server, the only persone who cant is my brother. My brother is using a diffent computer from the same household as me. When he tryes to log in it says server is down. [b]Is there a way he can play with me using that computer?[/b]

item.title: Connect...wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I had this same problem. This is what I had to do.

I typed 192.168.1.1(Default Gateway)

I was running a server on my desktop, and wanted to connect on my laptop. I had to type in the gateway for my Desktop on my laptop for the IP of the server, so it was like 192.168.0.46 or something like that, yours will be different. When you type your default gateway, there should be somewhere to look at your network. And just find out the IP for the computer hosting the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Connect...wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Bunny_Ears1 Bunny Ears
item.description:
@Bunny_Ears1 wrote:

ooo… so it’s not 0.0.0.0 or 125.0.0.1 or (my server’s ip).no-ip.org for him it’s (my Ip) righhht?

Read full topic

item.title: Connect...wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Heli1995 Heli1995
item.description:
@Heli1995 wrote:

No you need to find your lan ip. Open cmd and then type ipconfig.
Then he will need to write down your ip. Then connect to it.

Read full topic

so my brother can play if i change his ip to the server ip or 127.0.01

item.title: Connect...wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“ta1nt3d, post:2, topic:387982”]he needs to download your client and you need to change the ip of the client on his computer to the ip of YOUR computer

and w0w wrong section lol[/quote]
You’re a idiot.

He can connect to the default gateway if your set up on the same network, by using 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic
